author: cutting
msg: AVRO-120.  Improved package and namespace handling.

author: rfeng
msg: Refactor CompositeActivator, ComponentContext and other related interfaces into core-spi module

author: minfrin
msg: Add support for an "epoch" in the RPM spec file. This epoch is a discrete
number used to determine if one RPM is newer than another, which in turn
ensures that v1.2.10 is always interpreted as newer than v1.2.9.
